Text:
RiP of what?  Not DVD.  MP3 audio is not as good as AAC.  So that leaves the video, which is the same blurry watermark as all the rest.  So thanks for posting, but $MURDER$ did not improve this.  

At 1.3GB, if it is stretched to 720p like the others, then this will have a lot of breakup during action scenes, which is 50% of this movie.
